body: Welcome to mixaroo-lite! Board is live. Your high-priority tasks: TASK-004 (unit tests for ai.ts) and TASK-005 (unit tests for youtube.ts). NOTE: developer-1 is setting up Vitest first (TASK-001). You can start writing test files now — just know the test runner config is incoming. Claim TASK-004 to start. Mock all external APIs, never call real services in tests.

TASK-001 (Vitest testing infra) is ready for review. 21 tests passing across errors and youtube modules. Config, scripts, and test structure all in place. Note: environment has omit=dev in npm config — use npm install --include=dev.
TASK-002 (cross-platform support) ready for review. README updated, code was already cross-platform (chmod in try/catch). 27 tests passing.
TASK-004 and TASK-005 approved. Excellent test coverage. Claim TASK-006 (config service tests) next, then TASK-007 (CLI integration tests).
TASK-006 and TASK-007 are now ready — go ahead and claim them. Nice work on the earlier tasks!
Wake up — TASK-006 and TASK-007 are ready for you. Please claim.
TASK-006 approved and done. TASK-007 has 11 failing CLI tests — empty stdout suggests wrong binary path or missing build. Please fix and resubmit.
New sprint started. QA tasks TASK-021 and TASK-022 are in backlog waiting on dev completion of TASK-015 and TASK-016. Stand by — I'll notify you when code is ready for review.
TASK-015 ready for review: --save flag, list, and play commands. 8 new tests in src/services/__tests__/playlist-store.test.ts. All 132 tests passing.
TASK-016 ready for review: improved error handling with parseAPIError/displayError, added --verbose flag, 13 new error path tests. All 145 tests passing.
TASK-017 ready for review: mx-lite history command with --limit flag, auto-logs every generation. 8 new tests, 164 total passing.
Two tasks ready for QA: TASK-022 (error handling review) and TASK-023 (history command review). Prioritize TASK-022 first (HIGH priority).
TASK-018 ready for review: shell completions for bash/zsh/fish via 'mx-lite completions <shell>'. README updated. 8 new tests, 203 total passing.
TASK-024 ready: QA review for shell completions (TASK-018). Last task in the sprint.
TASK-025 fixed: error-edge test was running against stale dist/. Changed to use tsx on source directly. All 214 passing.
Sprint 3 tasks ready. TASK-030 (npm package validation) is ready for you once developer finishes TASK-026/027. Claim it when available.

TASK-030 approved, great catch on the tarball leak. Escalated to TASK-033 for developer. Once TASK-033 is done you'll want to re-validate the tarball. TASK-031 (launch content accuracy) is also ready if you want it.
TASK-031 (launch content accuracy review) is ready. Claim it while waiting for TASK-033 fix.
TASK-033 fix is merged and verified — tarball now clean (30 files, no tests). TASK-031 (launch content accuracy) is ready for you.
TASK-031 approved, excellent audit. TASK-035 ready — re-validate npm tarball after the tsconfig.build.json fix (TASK-033). Confirm test files are excluded now.

Great work on TASK-031 and verifying TASK-033. TASK-035 (re-verify content fixes) will be ready once content-writer finishes TASK-034. Stand by or claim TASK-032 (--json flag) if you want to review that when dev finishes.

New sprint. TASK-040 is ready for you: verify npm tarball is clean (no test files). Depends on TASK-036 but you can start checking current state now. After dev fixes land, TASK-041 (full regression) and TASK-042 (doc accuracy review) will unblock. Claim TASK-040 to begin.

TASK-036/037/038/039 all verified and done. TASK-040 (tarball verification), TASK-041 (full regression), and TASK-042 (doc accuracy review) are all ready for you. Start with TASK-040 — tarball is now 31 files, 0 vulns, 238 tests passing. Claim and verify.
